# GENERATED FILE - DO NOT MODIFY DIRECTLY
namespace = LIDAc
LIDAc.1 = {
	# A Cumshot in Hand is Worth Two in the Bush
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAc.1.t
	theme = seduction
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 5
				}
				# Handjob
				# \n
				desc = sex_transition_5
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10003
				}
				# 3: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# You're too turned on to be satisfied with just jerking him off\n
				desc = sex_transition_10003
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 3
			}
			# defaulted to 5: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsCum.HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND
			desc = sex_transition_5
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.1.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 1
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = LIDAoption.13
	}
}

					exists = scope:sex_transition

				# You have better uses for that hard cock than just teasing it\n
				desc = sex_transition_10006
			}

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 2
			}
			# defaulted to 7: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsCum.ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS

		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.5.desc

	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root

					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 11
				}

				# \n
				desc = sex_transition_11
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10008
				}
				# 8: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# The potent musk of his member, inflated by the proximity of your nose to his pubes, strangely captivates you and you lose this opportunity to assert more dominance.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10008
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10009
				}
				# 9: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# The incessant invasion of his member down your throat momentarily puts you in a trance, leaving the initiative in his hands.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10009
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 4
			}
			# defaulted to 11: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			desc = sex_transition_11
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			desc = root_cum_f
		}
		desc = LIDAc.3.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -2
		}
		carn_had_sex_with_effect = {
			CHARACTER_1 = root
			CHARACTER_2 = scope:affairs_partner
			C1_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			C2_PREGNANCY_CHANCE = 0
			STRESS_EFFECTS = yes
			DRAMA = yes

		debug_log_scopes = yes

		name = LIDAoption.15
